rows.label: tev030301_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030301_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Veven about Professor B.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030301_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030301_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Veven about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030301_MSG0001
rows.name:
What can I say? We have traveled far and wide across
the cosmos, but never have we met a xenoform with
technology quite like like Professor B's.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030301_MSG0002
rows.name:
Whatever logic his schematics followed was unlike
either the Samaar's or our own, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030301_MSG0003
rows.name:
It was all pretty baffling, wasn't it? But I will still
remember my intellectually inspiring stint as Professor
B's assistant fondly...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030301_MSG0004
rows.name:
I may even miss his indecipherable barrage of
questionably quantum quandaries already?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030301_MSG0005
rows.name:
Do you suppose he'll ever come back to see us in
present-day Mira?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030301_MSG0008
rows.name:
Since his departure, I've been reviewing Professor B's
materials with great scrutiny, all right? But I still can't
seem to make heads or proverbial tails of it...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030301_MSG0009
rows.name:
A shame, don't you think? The Miramobile Mark II
I dream of building may not see the light of day for
many years to come...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030301_MSG0010
rows.name:
*sigh* I wonder what Professor B is doing right now?
Well, not RIGHT right now, but... You know what I
mean, right? I hope he made it back to the future.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030301_SEL1011
rows.name: Ask Veven about conditions on Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030301_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Veven about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030301_MSG0011
rows.name:
Professor B gave that gadget of his a try, right?
But what to make of this strange anomaly that envelops
Mira?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030301_MSG0012
rows.name:
I pressed the professor for an explanation, but he
refused to to elaborate in the absence of evidence.
He was quite adamant about that, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030301_MSG0013
rows.name:
As best as I can tell, Mira is surrounded by some kind
of space-time...barrier?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030301_MSG0014
rows.name:
But the significance of the barrier eludes me,
you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030301_MSG0015
rows.name:
I suppose I'll have to study harder if I am to stay
abreast of Professor B's epochal findings, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030301_MSG0018
rows.name:
In order to help pay off his loan from Graham,
Professor B founded a company called Factory 1.21.
Did you know this?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030301_MSG0019
rows.name:
Anyway, somewhere along the line he made me a sort
of...honorary employee? Though how honored I felt
seemed to be beside the point...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030301_MSG0020
rows.name:
Anyway, I don't get paid unless our products sell,
so please make a purchase or two. ...Or, um, five?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030301_MSG0021
rows.name:
Professor B may have his quirks, but you know as well
as I do that his engineering skills are nothing to sneeze
at, correct?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030301_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Veven about Factory 1.21's products.

rows.label: tev030301_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Veven about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030301_SEL0052
rows.name: Oh, I'm so glad you asked![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030301_SEL0053
rows.name:
All our weapons come equipped with powerful pressure
fields that crush the target, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030301_SEL0054
rows.name:
This lets them bypass enemy armor and inflict damage
no no no matter how well fortified your opponents are![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030301_SEL0055
rows.name:
You should try putting at least one of our weapons
through the paces, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030301_SEL0056
rows.name:
If you don't find a weapon that aids you in battle,
I'll eat my wrench! ...Maybe? I'll consider it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030301_MSG0022
rows.name:
In the end, Graham couldn't refuse, and he ended up
working at Factory 1.21, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030301_MSG0023
rows.name:
Honestly, Professor B and I don't know a lot about
doing business with humans, so it's probably good that
we have him around?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030301_MSG0024
rows.name:
Anyway, the end result is is that Factory 1.21 will keep
manufacturing unique products that leverage the
technology of the future, if that makes sense?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030301_MSG0025
rows.name:
"Take a Piece of Tomorrow Home Today"!
...How did I do? Did that sound legit?[ST:wait ]
